page.title: 18HOME LIFE cont.
page.content: will be coming home. The cricket finishes. Then my mum comes through the door, puts the bags down, and makes a cup of tea. Meanwhile i'm playing in the playground. At quarter to two my dad leaves for work. My mum is doing the ironing. At quarter to three my mum goes to work at Edenham. At half past three after a long and tiring day, we go home to our nan's house. Meanwhile my mum is washing the floors, and my is delivering letters. At my nan's i'm having my tea. At quarter past six my mum comes around and picks us up. At eight o'clock p.m. my dad comes home, then I go to bed looking forward to SATURDAY.
